content: X-P B3 MX Concrete nails (collated) Ultimate-performance collated nails for fastening to concrete and other base materials using the BX 3 cordless nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate-performance nail for soft and some tough concrete Long, conical tip and high hardness – for excellent fastening quality Applications Fastening to soft and some tough concrete Fastening to solid masonry Fastening to filled block ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Masonry (grout filled concrete block) Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 2-3/8 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Masonry (grout filled concrete block) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 2-3/8 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.12 in | Point type | Long conical tip | Approvals | ETA, ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | BX 3 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2314521 - High performance nail X-P 17 B3 MX Bulk - Package Size 1000 pc - 3641694 - 1/2 pallet BULK 120K X-P 17 B3 MX - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 120000x High performance nail X-P 17 B3 MX Bulk - 2314523 - High performance nail X-P 20 B3 MX Bulk - Package Size 1000 pc - 3641695 - 1/2 pallet BULK 108K X-P 20 B3 MX - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 108000x High performance nail X-P 20 B3 MX Bulk - 2298508 - High performance nail X-P 24 B3 MX BULK - Package Size 1000 pc
